storyInfo: An exiled swordsman finds herself in a foreign land. There, she spends a normal day.

attributes.content: My Lord, our defeat is imputable only to my inadequate command and inability to see through the enemy's treacherous plot. The responsibility is mine to bear!
I know my transgressions are unforgivable, and no one should pity me even if I am to atone for them with my life, but I ask for one final chance to repay you. I swear I can—

attributes.text: Even if I were to have you beheaded here and now, or sent you to your death on the battlefield, would that regain the ground we lost in the war, or bring back the men that died because of you? How will you take responsibility for any of this?
What exactly is war to you?

attributes.content: My Lord! I—

attributes.text: Akafuyu, you have no right to remain here.

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: The swordsman sheaths her blade and takes a deep breath. Then, she takes out a dagger and adds another mark to the tally on the wall.
It has been 137 days since her exile from Higashi, and 39 days since she arrived in this strange, foreign city called Lungmen.

Before she left Higashi, she received the invitation of a company called 'Rhodes Island' and was told she still had a chance to fight as a swordsman—perhaps something her master had consented to without her knowledge.
Her only duty for now is to wait here patiently until the company's handler comes to take her to her new asylum—a place far from Higashi.
The road ahead is uncertain.
Never before have I been negligent in my training, but I'm out of blade oil.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: What to do...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: As the saying goes, a vagrant swordsman is as fragile as a fowlbeast. The sharper the blade in their hands once was, the easier it is to break.

She had run into several nearly-fatal encounters before leaving Higashi, and while her journey since then had been relatively uneventful, she can't be certain her enemies hadn't followed her to this foreign land. She mustn't let her guard down.
Per the arrangement, every ten days, at the exact same time on the dot, someone comes by to leave her daily necessities by the door, and she should not freely leave the room.
Nothing out of the ordinary today...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Her temporary residence is situated in an old alley on the outskirts of the city. Completely inconspicuous, and mostly safe as far as she knows.

Occasionally, there are pedestrians of all sorts passing by, and a breakfast stall owner opens up his stall nearby at the same time everyday. There have been no other noteworthy characters, let alone suspicious ones.

From the window, she can see but a corner of this strange city. Lungmen's size is on a completely different scale compared to her hometown, though it does bear some resemblance to the stories she's heard of bizarre, dazzling cities under the Southern Court's rule.
I'm all out of food. The next supply drop is scheduled for today.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: There could be pursuers nearby... It might not be entirely safe to head outside.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Tch... So irritating. A swordsman should never avoid a battle for fear of the enemy! Never has a warrior of Kougon had to suffer such shame!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: But being adaptable is a necessary part of my training, too.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: And so is eating on time...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Deep in the alley.
For the first time since a little more than a month ago, the swordsman takes a careful step outside the room and observes the area from a low angle.
The alley is closely flanked by short buildings on both sides, with only a narrow opening through which to see the sky, faintly reminding her of the shrine's low ceiling.
They look like a bunch of old residences, and there's nothing special about any of them. There are a lot of things hanging from the buildings, and no good vantage points for snipers.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: There is only one entrance and exit. Even if I had anyone tailing me, it would be difficult for them to hide themselves. That said, if I'm ambushed and find myself outnumbered, it would be just as difficult for me to escape.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: I shouldn't stay here for long—
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Captain! Watch for the turrets!
attributes.name: Flustered Voice

attributes.content: It's a trap! We've been had! There's too many of them, and keeping up the fight won't get us anywhere...
attributes.name: Flustered Voice

attributes.content: Get ahold of yourself! We'll fight our way out of here!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Please, you must fall back! We'll stay behind and buy you time!
attributes.name: Flustered Voice

attributes.content: She opens her eyes to find no one around her.
The sun shines down upon her. It's no different from the sun on that snowy day. What is different is the oily smell wafting into her nostrils from a shop facing the street.
Lou Ban, how come you're stir-frying vegetables this early in the day?
attributes.name: Passerby Diner

attributes.content: I thought I'd change things up a little. Youngsters these days wake up pretty late, to the point that they have breakfast and lunch in one meal. Might as well follow the trends, don't you think?
attributes.name: Breakfast Stall Owner

attributes.content: Calm down... I mustn't lose my composure because of my past mistakes... Calm down.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Lass, you haven't had anything to eat, have you? Want something?
attributes.name: Breakfast Stall Owner

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how much of a rush you're in. You still gotta eat.
attributes.name: Breakfast Stall Owner

attributes.content: (Your average hole-in-the-wall eatery. Both the owner and the patrons are normal folk. I sense no threat from them whatsoever.)
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: (Perhaps I can stave my hunger here.)
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: What do you serve?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Dau zeong, jau zaa gwai, bao, caau min. You name it, I got it. All our customers say we have the best cheongfun in town. Want to give it a try?
attributes.name: Breakfast Stall Owner

attributes.content: (These Yanese manjuu have some kind of filling inside... and who knows where they got these strange sauces. The aroma is enough to make one's mind waver...)
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: (No... This doesn't sound safe. I should look for something safer to eat.)
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: What was with that girl just now? Maybe she's not carrying any cash?
attributes.name: Passerby Diner

attributes.content: She's an unfamiliar face. Might not live nearby.
attributes.name: Breakfast Stall Owner

attributes.content: She looked pretty malnourished, too. Must've been some time since she had a proper meal. *sigh* If she was really that tight on money, I could've treated her to something.
attributes.name: Breakfast Stall Owner

attributes.content: The port.
As one of the city's most important ports of entry, it is also one of the places with the greatest foot traffic. If her handler were here, this is probably where she'd find him.

The swordsman stands at a high vantage point and looks into the distance. Large ships are swallowing up and disgorging large amounts of cargo and passengers, stopping briefly before sailing away just as quickly.
Perhaps one of these ships could also take her straight to Higashi...
No... It is far too soon for me to return.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: I have been exiled as a defeated general, and have accomplished nothing since. Even if I do return home, I have no right to face Master...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Ma'am... Sorry, but you're stepping on my boxes...
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: Oh? Sorry...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Want to buy some fins?
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: I have all kinds, caught fresh just today. I can cut them for you, or make them into sashimi, if you like.
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: (Sashimi... a familiar dish.)
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: (No extraneous preparations and no unnecessary seasonings. A safe dish.)
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Yes, I'll buy a fin. Make it sashimi.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: You got it. One serving of sashimi, coming right up.
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: (A hawker has such fine skills?)
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: (It's an ordinary boning knife, but he wields it with such accuracy and finesse. The strength he puts into his arm and the angle at which he's slicing into the meat both align with the principles of swordsmanship.)
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Such amazing knife skills...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Who taught you your knife techniques? What is the name of the school? Does the blade itself have a history?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Ma'am... are you asking me?
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: The name's Jaye. I'm a seafood hawker, and my uncle taught me how to use a knife.
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: This one's used for cutting fins, and it's never sliced anything else. As for the technique... I mean, it takes all kinds of different knives and techniques to process shellshrimps and fins...
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: So it's a school that practices its techniques behind closed doors... How formidable.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: I once met a swordsman who trained for ten years only by cutting straw mats at the shrine. It doesn't matter how ordinary a technique is. Once mastered, the force that can be unleashed is no less potent than any other.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: You possess such fine skills, yet find yourself working as a fin hawker... You must also be a swordsman yet to find success. It seems misery loves company.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Let me ask you. What are your ambitions? Who will you serve with your prowess?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: I... I'm not a very ambitious fella...
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: In the short term, I want to drive up business, make more money, and get a bigger storefront as soon as possible...
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: Why would you say that? Don't you feel your knife skills are going to waste when you use them only to cut these small fry?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: (Small fry? Does she think this fin is too small?)
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: Um... I have bigger fins too, of course. They're sold by weight. I'm not trying to shortchange you or anything. Just worried it'd be too much for you to eat.
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: (Not only are his words riddled with hidden meanings, he is questioning me through my appetite?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Surely you jest? 'My skills and techniques are as immense as my appetite.' A single fin is hardly enough to satiate my hunger! Bring me the largest fin you have!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Okay, okay!
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: Here to pick up an order.
attributes.name: Cold Voice

attributes.content: One grass fin, three kan of shellshrimp.
attributes.name: Cold Voice

attributes.content: Yup, all ready to go. Here.
attributes.name: Seafood Hawker

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: With light footsteps at a brisk pace, a familiar silhouette passes by in the crowd, like a fin that suddenly leapt from the water before submerging itself in the river just as quickly, leaving not a trace.
That outfit... A ninja from the Southern Court? What are they doing here?!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: My Lord! My apologies for my tardiness in coming to your defense. Is everything okay?!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Prudent Voice

attributes.content: These ninja... They plot to assassinate you again and again... Despicable scoundrels! They know they can never defeat you on the battlefield, so they resort to these craven methods!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Akafuyu, do you know why these men want me dead?
attributes.name: Prudent Voice

attributes.content: Of course I do. You are a senior minister of the Kougon clan and its bravest commander. They fear you, and as such wish you harm.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: No, that reason belongs to those who sent them, not to the men themselves.
attributes.name: Prudent Voice

attributes.content: What is sad is that those who lie at our feet lifeless never found a reason, even unto death.
attributes.name: Prudent Voice

attributes.content: Akafuyu, you must not be like them.
A long street.
After a lengthy chase, it is already nighttime.

The streets are lined with bright lights, and there is a sea of colorfully illuminated signs and tall buildings. She can hear cheers and laughter from the passersby all around her. Is it perhaps a holiday here in this strange, foreign land?
The swordsman stands alone in the tide of pedestrians, like a reef continuously struck by the waves. The target she was following has long since vanished without a trace.
Did they plan ahead of time to lure me here...?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Assassination in a busy marketplace. Typical of those wretched ninjas... It's their favorite trick.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Back alley brawls are not my forte, but losing the will to fight would only give them an opening.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Where are they...!?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: The swordsman grips tightly onto her sword's hilt and concentrates in an attempt to locate that faint hint of danger among the clamor, only to come up short.
Who goes there—?!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Bro! That outfit's so cool! It's just like the real thing!
attributes.name: Excited Youth

attributes.content: Akafuyu turns around to find a young man fondling her shoulderguards with twinkling, excited eyes.
The swordsman is about to snap, but the innocent look on his face seems strange and foreign—How could a commoner be so unafraid to approach a fully-armored bushi?
Are you not afraid of me?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Afraid? Why?
attributes.name: Excited Youth

attributes.content: Isn't today the day that Nanboku Fuuunden preorders are open? How did you get the outfit's design already? Oh, I get it. You're an official cosplayer, aren't you?
attributes.name: Excited Youth

attributes.content: That armor... You're a swordsman of the Kougon clan from the Northern Court, right? I heard the Northern swordsmen have high base stats, and the Southern ninjas have more maneuverability, but I think the swordsmen's gear is way cooler!
attributes.name: Excited Youth

attributes.content: What exactly are you talking about...?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Wait, ninja? You saw a ninja?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Yeah. Look over there.
attributes.name: Excited Youth

attributes.content: Akafuyu looks in the direction the young man is pointing. The colorful lights are dizzying. With great effort, she manages to focus her gaze on a big screen in the video game store on the side of the road.

The character in the game is equipped with a set of armor and a sword that both look almost exactly like hers, and is unleashing all sorts of moves she is incapable of to mow down exaggerated numbers of enemies.
The enemies on the screen scream as their flesh and blood fly in all directions. Likewise, the audience on the other side of the screen are screaming with joy and excitement.
She notices her reflection on the crystal clear display window, looking like an absurd outsider.
Suddenly, the swordsman laughs.
Hah...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: You're a lucky guy, living here.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: I hope you'll never have to be scared of this...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: But remember. This isn't cool at all.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Akafuyu?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: This logo... Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: We ran into some trouble on the way here, and it took us longer than expected to arrive.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Sorry for the wait. How has life been here? Ran into any problems?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It is a strange place, but an interesting one nonetheless.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Wait. Are you from Ursus?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: *sigh*... I put on a disguise to avoid trouble. Did my accent give it away? Fine, yes, I'm from Ursus.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: They have contact with Higashi, and they hire Ursus...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: What sort of place is this 'Rhodes Island'?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: A peaceful place.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: There, you'll find Ursus, Higashinese, Kazimierzians, and Leithanians.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm not saying that we make everyone pretend that all those unpleasant things never happened. It's just that we don't operate on a logic based on hatred and violence.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But I was told that I still had a chance to fight as a swordsman with Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Oh, you will. There are many excellent warriors like you aboard. We're a pharmaceutical company, but sometimes you need to fight to save lives.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But most of the time, everyone spends their time doing normal things. Eating, drinking tea, and figuring out ways to avoid situations where we have to fight.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Interesting. I will take a good look at this place myself.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Heh, you seem a lot easier to get along with than I expected.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Do you need time to pack your things before we get on our way?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: All I need is this blade. Let's go.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.text: I will learn what it means to fight, and discover where I should be pointing my blade.
